iPhone 5, 5c, 5s, SE, 8, and 8 Plus screens will not be available on-demand. These screens will need to be requested so we can order them to fix your device.
Additional fees for travel may apply. 30-day warranty on all phone repairs against defects.

If you would like to inquire more information about other screen replacements or replacement options, call or text at (918) 609-0512 or fill out the form at the bottom of the webpage for a free quote!
